T.query: select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date, d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where e.emp_no > 30000 and s.from_date > '1980-01-01' and e.last_name like 'A%' and e.gender = 'M' and e.birth_date > '1950-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%' and s.salary > 50000 and d.dept_name = 'Production' and de.from_date > '1986-01-01';

F.query: select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date, d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where e.emp_no > 30000 and s.from_date > '1980-01-01' and e.last_name like 'A%' and e.gender = 'M' and e.birth_date > '1950-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%' and s.salary > 30000 and d.dept_name = 'Production' and de.from_date > '1986-01-01';

select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date, d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where e.emp_no >10000 and s.to_date > '1990-01-01' and e.last_name like 'A%' and e.gender = 'M' and e.birth_date > '1950-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%' and s.salary > 20000 and d.dept_name = 'Development' and de.from_date > '1986-01-01';

select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date, d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where e.emp_no > 30000 and s.from_date > '1980-01-01' and e.last_name like 'A%' and e.gender = 'M' and e.birth_date > '1950-01-01' and t.title like 'Senior%' and s.salary > 50000 and d.dept_name = 'Production' and de.from_date > '1986-01-01' and e.hire_date>'1998-01-01';
